3typedef struct {
4 uint8_t x;
5 uint8_t y;
6 const Icon* icon;
7} GuiIconModel;
8
9static void gui_icon_draw(Canvas* canvas, WidgetElement* element) {
10 furi_assert(canvas);
11 furi_assert(element);
12 GuiIconModel* model = element->model;
13
14 if(model->icon) {
15 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, model->x, model->y, model->icon);
16 }
17}
18
19static void gui_icon_free(WidgetElement* gui_icon) {
20 furi_assert(gui_icon);
21
22 free(gui_icon->model);
23 free(gui_icon);
24}
25
26WidgetElement* widget_element_icon_create(uint8_t x, uint8_t y, const Icon* icon) {
27 furi_assert(icon);
28
29 // Allocate and init model
30 GuiIconModel* model = malloc(sizeof(GuiIconModel));
31 model->x = x;
32 model->y = y;
33 model->icon = icon;
34
35 // Allocate and init Element
36 WidgetElement* gui_icon = malloc(sizeof(WidgetElement));
37 gui_icon->parent = NULL;
38 gui_icon->input = NULL;
39 gui_icon->draw = gui_icon_draw;
40 gui_icon->free = gui_icon_free;
41 gui_icon->model = model;
42
43 return gui_icon;
44}
